name: Joined Hunt
description:
Play with your friend and uncover the message below the veil by cooperating to remove individual tiles.

You may not talk with your partner during the game. You must coordinate using the game only.

Sometimes the server is down, so try soon after. 

This game runs in a console window. Use the cmd or powershell on windows or any terminal on Linux.

Windows classifies this file as "possible virus". This is a known bug in windows. If you don't trust me, you can also build the game yourself with sourcecode at https://s.pixdigit.tk/f4afb3
